amendment.description: Amendments en bloc comprised of amendments numbered 62, 73, 74, 77, 78, 84, 85, 86, 87, 88, 89, 92, 93, 95, 97, 98 and 100 printed in House Report 114-112. See page D544 of the Congressional Record for description of en bloc amendments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment comprised of amendments nos. 62, 73, 74, 77, 78, 84, 85, 86, 87, 88, 89, 92, 93, 95, 97, 98 and 100 printed in House Report 114-112 offered en bloc.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A019) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Thornberry amendments (A019) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendments en bloc (A019) offered by Mr. Thornberry.
